localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Partnerbow makes it simple to request and negotiate price quotes from multiple partners, approve or reject proposed hours and pricing, track payments as well as keep an up-to-date catalogue of all your partner agencies and freelancers.
blogPost.body: Partnerbow makes it simple to request and negotiate price quotes from multiple partners, approve or reject proposed hours and pricing, track payments as well as keep an up-to-date catalogue of all your partner agencies and freelancers.
blogPost.title: Partnerbow - Easy way to request, negotiate and approve price estimates.
blogPost.author: Taavi Raidma

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以让您简单地请求和协商多个合作伙伴的报价，批准或拒绝建议的工时和定价，跟踪付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴机构和自由职业者的最新目录。
localize.tagline: 简单的方法来申请、谈判和批准价格估算。

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以讓您簡單地請求和協商多個合作伙伴的報價，批准或拒絕建議的工時和定價，跟蹤付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴機構和自由職業者的最新目錄。
localize.tagline: 簡單的方法來申請、談判和批准價格估算。

previous.excerpt: What is possible with AR? We don't even know yet. But innovative and creative people are already developing interesting apps and solutions using augmented reality. Check out our AR collection.
previous.title: Augmented Reality 2021 - 60+ AR use cases and hundreds of examples

localize.description: AR有什么可能？我们甚至还不知道。但创新和创意的人们已经在使用增强现实开发有趣的应用程序和解决方案。看看我们的AR系列。
localize.tagline: 60多个AR使用案例和数百个例子

localize.description: AR有什麼可能？我們甚至還不知道。但創新和創意的人們已經在使用增強現實開發有趣的應用程序和解決方案。看看我們的AR系列。
localize.tagline: 60多個AR使用案例和數百個例子

next.excerpt: The app shows the UTC time in the menu bar or a Notification Center widget. This can be useful as a quick reference. You can also quickly copy the date & time in ISO8601 format. The app is free and requires macOS 11.1.
next.title: UTC Time - Show the time in UTC in the menu bar or a widget

localize.description: 该应用程序在菜单栏或通知中心小部件中显示UTC时间。这可以作为一个快速的参考。你也可以快速复制ISO8601格式的日期和时间。该应用程序是免费的，需要macOS 11.1。
localize.tagline: 在菜单栏或小部件中以UTC显示时间。

localize.description: 該應用程序在菜單欄或通知中心小部件中顯示UTC時間。這可以作爲一個快速的參考。你也可以快速複製ISO8601格式的日期和時間。該應用程序是免費的，需要macOS 11.1。
localize.tagline: 在菜單欄或小部件中以UTC顯示時間。
